TopicTitle: Help to get this SSTO, O'ing?

Articles.Content:
Help to get this design working? more or less. I want room for 8 kerbals, the big bay capable of containing a small lander or resource probe, and i'd prefer enough dv to refuel at minmus orbit.

- [MK1](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-AasI6RoMs3WWVyQ19zU1FHMUk)
- [MK2](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-AasI6RoMs3YkgzeUtVUVA4Q2s)  
My first attempt at a SSTO that feels like its gonna work
